message: St. Francis de Sales College (SFS College), established in 2004 in Bengaluru, Karnataka, is run by the Missionaries of St. Francis de Sales (MSFS). It is NAAC-accredited with an 'A' grade, AICTE-approved, UGC-recognized, and ISO 9001:2015 certified. The college offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs. It is permanently affiliated with Bangalore University and was granted Autonomous status in 2024.
